Text: This game is not working for my Computer, Freezes when I start

@muddemon4: Read the instructions.  "Copy everything from the SKIDROW folder to install directory and overwrite."  Once you do that, you won't be bothered with Steam activation ever again.  Also, FYI, you don't even need to have Steam on after that, that is the whole point of acquiring these games on here.

@Ferch1: Try VirtualCloneDrive.  Hasn't let me down so far ;) .
